name: Google Matrix updated 2015 January
description: Matrix-fy Google. Some unintended Google sub-domains are affected and the style is poorly displayed in those cases. Some modifications may be required.
additional_info: This is mostly borrowed css from Ozyart. The original css can be found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/65141/google-matrix
